thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-The Manitowoc Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.97

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-The Manitowoc Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.97
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Manitowoc Company Inc:
* THE MANITOWOC COMPANY REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.15 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.98 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 SALES $481.5 MILLION VERSUS $378.2 MILLION * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.97 * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.15 * SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES APPROXIMATELY $25 MILLION TO $30 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05, REVENUE VIEW $422.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
